DOC.brief_summary: This phase 2 , single-blind , placebo-controlled study evaluate onset-of-action , safety , efficacy RDX227675 treatment hyperkalemia . Subjects qualify randomize one four treatment group : Group 1 ( Placebo qd ) , Group 2 ( RDX227675 10 g qd ) , Group 3 ( RDX227675 20 g qd ) , Group 4 ( RDX227675 30 g qd ) .
